name: Bloody HELL (Dezert)
description:
Project for "Game Design and Development 3: 3D Shooter" by Michigan State University.

I add:

  • 3 diferent lvls (start instruction, boos-fight, maze)
  • Change color scheme for some 3D obj
  • Repaint UI textures
  • Change UI layout
  • 2 new pick-ups: movment speed and jump pover
  • Change lights to red
  • Lower sound

by Shnyrkova Daria with assets from MSU
